### 清空规则
```
iptables -F
iptables -X
iptables -Z
```
`修改规则后 iptables-save >> /etc/iptables/iptables.rules 保持`
### 规则文件
`/etc/iptables/iptables.rules`

```
# Generated by iptables-save v1.8.9 on Wed Mar  1 15:02:31 2023
*nat
:PREROUTING ACCEPT [126:5848]
:INPUT ACCEPT [80:4104]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [1:112]
:POSTROUTING ACCEPT [1:112]
COMMIT
# Completed on Wed Mar  1 15:02:31 2023
# Generated by iptables-save v1.8.9 on Wed Mar  1 15:02:31 2023
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
-A INPUT -s 127.0.0.1/32 -d 127.0.0.1/32 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 27502 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 443 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -j REJECT --reject-with icmp-port-unreachable
-A FORWARD -p tcp -m tcp ! --tcp-flags FIN,SYN,RST,ACK SYN -m state --state NEW -j DROP
-A OUTPUT -j ACCEPT
COMMIT
# Completed on Wed Mar  1 15:02:31 2023
```
